snippet: After decades operating with the option offense, Frank Solich switched to the spread before last season with Ohio. The move proved successful against Penn State.
abstract: Ohio football coach Frank Solich's decision to switch to the spread offense helps his team defeat Penn State, 24-14, in their college football opener.
lead_paragraph: After decades operating with the option offense, Frank Solich switched to the spread before last season with Ohio. The move proved successful against Penn State.

headline.seo: Penn State Is Signature Win for Solich and Ohio’s Offense
headline.main: When a Coach Called a Shift
headline.print_headline: When a Coach Called a Shift
